channel.title: Throne of Lies the Board game?
channel.description:
## Set Up: Board with 12 token holes are filled with blank tokens - if the unseen try to convert someone or poison them they remove one of the tokens and places in either poison or convert token, before the day stage all players look at the tokens.
Converted - Converted players will keep their abilities and have the same order, but will also wake up with assassin and mastermind
Class Tokens - 2 class tokens of every bd class are in the middle, if a player claims that class they then pick up the token and put it next to them, also used if a mystic links someone were the linked person points at the class token they claim.
Card - At the start of the game every play receives a card detailing what faction and class they are.
## Classes ## Butler #
Wine - Place a "wine" token in front of a player occupying them, at the end of the player you occupied's turn they place the token back into the middle.
## Mystic ## Link - Tap a player's shoulder, the player you selected will then choose a class token that they claim in the middle and show it up to the mystic, they also point at the person they will be visiting tonight. ## Merc Guard - Prevent players from visiting your target they will not be informed.
## Knight
Defend - Defend a player if they were attacked you will kill them and you will die as well. CS - Attack a player if they are unseen but not mastermind they will die, if they were bd you will die.( 1 use)
## Mastermind Can't be occupied
Convert - Place a "convert" day token in the board of a player. (1 day cooldown)
## Assassin If there is no assasin the next player converted or a converted player that is not the assassin will then become the assassin.
Poison - At the beginning of the night, you can place a poison token in front of a player (you can only use this once per 3 people)
Attack - When you wake up with mastermind you can decide to kill a player.
## Other
Player List 6 Players: 5 BD 1 MM - Their can only be two converts at a time. 7-9 Players 4-6 BD 1 MM 1 Assassin - Can be 3 converts
Night Order: Assassin - Poison Butler Merc Knight Mystic Assassin + Mastermind
